CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When the solvent was changed from DCB to TCB , the photovoltaic performance could be further improved.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. DCB (Material Name: Dicyclopentadiene)
2. TCB (Material Name: Tetracycline)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies for including irrelevant entities earlier. Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph:

1. DCB (Material Name: Dicyclopentadiene)
2. TCB (Material Name: Tetracycline)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid Material Name entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| DCB |
| TCB |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When the solvent was changed from DCB to TCB , the photovoltaic performance could be further improved.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. Solvent: DCB (Direct Chlorobenzene) and TCB (Total Chlorobenzene) are the two solvents being referred to in the paragraph.
2. Photovoltaic performance: This is the property being studied or observed in the paragraph, which refers to the ability of a material or system to convert light into electrical energy.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties:

1. Solvent: This refers to the substance used to dissolve or mix with another substance. In this case, DCB and TCB are the two solvents being referred to.
2. Photovoltaic performance: This refers to the ability of a material or system to convert light into electrical energy. In this case, the paragraph is discussing the improvement in photovoltaic performance when the solvent is changed from DCB to TCB.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Solvent |
| Photovoltaic performance |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
